meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Adam Francois Watkins Maureen Block Sara Butner Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7835.

td.p: Adam Francois Watkins, a stay-at-home dad and lawyer from Atlanta, Georgia
Maureen Block, a high school English and film studies teacher from Rancho Cucamonga, California
Sara Butner, a communications manager from Winston-Salem, North Carolina (whose 1-day cash winnings total $32,700)

tr.td: TALE AS OLD AS TIME
UNDER THE SEA
LET IT GO
FRIEND LIKE ME
"HI" "HO"
DISNEY SONGS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Tired & disillusioned after a duel with the knight of the white moon, he returns home to La Mancha')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Tired & disillusioned after a duel with the knight of the white moon, he returns home to La Mancha

(including 3 DDs),

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
